覼覼覼

覼字的基本解释

覼
luó
〔覼缕〕a.详细而有条理地叙述，如“千变万状，不可覼覼。”b.婉转而有条理，如“众音覼覼不落道，有如部队随将军。”

覼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［luó］
［《廣韻》落戈切，平戈，來。］
亦作“覶1”。
繁，琐细。参见“覼瑣”、“覼縷”。

覼字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　覼； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1138第02
【類篇】俗覶字。【字彙補】省作?，非。

覼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
覼字的起名意思

形容详细而有条理地叙述，也指婉转而有条理。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
luó
〔覼碼〕a. Describe in detail and methodically, such as "The ever-changing, do not be obsessed." b. Tactfully and methodically, such as "The generals are like a general."
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［luó］
["Guangyun" drop Geqie, Ping Ge, come. ]
Also known as "覶1".
Complex and trivial. See "Xian Suo", "覼禼".
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [See the word department] 　覼; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 1138 02
【Classes】vulgar words. 【Word Supplement】Province for?, not.

Name meaning
Describes a detailed and methodical narrative, but also means tactfully and methodically.
